result.title: Some cheaters from #403. Cheater Report #4
result.content:
Hello Codeforces, I found some cheaters from Codeforces Round #403 (Div. 2, based on Technocup 2017 Finals). Lets see.

Firstly, cheaters are RealFan and cwy1211. Lets look their submission for problem B (A is easy problem, so most of users codes can look like each other). RealFan's submission and cwy1211's submission, names of most variables and algorithms are same. Ok, lets see submissions for C, RealFan's and cwy1211's, again, names of most variables are same and I have no idea why one of them changed name dfs to sc (what does sc mean?). Also some of them added this to code, but didn't use:

int QAQ=0;
	FOR(i,0,n-1) QAQ=max(QAQ,ans[i]);

Probably for not getting caught by system.

See their submissions for problem D, Realfan's and cwy1211's, again same kind of cheating but names of some variables are changed and one of them used const variable instead of 26... Shame on you Realfan and cwy1211! I hope you will not cheat again.

Probably I will update this entry and add more cheaters... Don't cheat!

Sorry for poor English.
